reviewText: I received this as a gift. DVD was produced in a busy, noisy restaurant but at least you could hear Thomas Tadlock speak. His tips are good ones and I would recommend this DVD. However, for me, I would rather he skipped the noise of a live event and just have someone film him talking.

I love this dvd !!!!!!!! :)
it has 5 secrets which i never heared in any other books about weight loss. Thomas is The Best :) !!!
